alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Simpson; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 2:00PM CDT until May 11 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR RANKIN...WESTERN SIMPSON...SOUTHEASTERN CLAIBORNE...SOUTH CENTRAL YAZOO...HINDS...COPIAH AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 200 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bentonia to Pocahontas to near Raymond to near Mcbride, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Jackson, Clinton, Raymond, Flora, Bentonia and Pocahontas around 205 PM CDT. Byram and Annandale around 210 PM CDT. Madison and Ridgeland around 215 PM CDT. Canton, Richland, Gluckstadt and Glancy around 220 PM CDT. Pearl, Flowood and Monterey around 225 PM CDT. Brandon, Hazlehurst, Martinsville, Fannin and Gallman around 230 PM CDT. Goshen Springs around 235 PM CDT. Pisgah and Sharon around 240 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southwestern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Madison; Rankin; Simpson; Yazoo
